Summary: Grey/white orb merged with grey jewel-like craft
trends: There has been one other sighting in Marquette Township
There were no other sightings in Marquette Township on or around March 20th 2012
divs: sighting detailsi left my house to look for northern lights to the north with my leitz binoculars. no dice, so i decided to star gaze. i saw what must be a planet in the western sky at around 45 degrees above the horizon, near orions shoulder and stared at that for a while because it seemed to show different colors. just to sample the entire sky i turned 180 degrees to look east over the lake and there they were. the little orb was ascending from the south at a low angle right up into\with the moving larger object travelling due north. there might have been a slight change in color when this happened. the object was not shiny, had no lights, but seemed dull until the orb merged. the larger object moved 1\2 as fast as the other object, noticeably changed direction, blocked stars and disappeared to the north east, not bright enough to be seen after passing behind a house, it's angle to the horizon appearing smaller as it travelled farther away.
